title: 2016 season review issue
body: When I click log in to see my stats, it just refreshes the page. really frustrating how can i fix this?

replies.body: Have you tried checking your review via Incognito or another browser, in case something is preventing you from loading the page. [ Clearing your cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) may also get this resolved too.  Let me know if that helps.
Ive tried everything you said it didnt work
